subject: Do you qualify for a Dish Network system
body:
dishdirect

















































































This promotion is sponsored exclusively by YourDishDeals and is subject to participation terms and conditions. See website for details. Participation eligibility is restricted to US residents 18 and over and is contingent on the satisfaction of promotion requirements. This is a limited time promotion and may expire in the near future. Restrictions may apply. If you no longer wish to receive emails containing the YourDishDeals offers, Click Here or, send a written request to Unsubscribe, YourDishDeals 1533 N Milwaukee, # 216  Boise, ID 83704
